Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Yes, if they accept large corporations and states. But even for states and large corporations the implementation of this project is very difficult. There are many factors that will directly interact. The existing infrastructure and bureaucracy will be enough to drown it. However, at the very beginning, local use may take place, and this will be an opportunity to prove yourself. So, I should note that such a hardcap today is not easy. Weak market and weak investor activity.

Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: McFly.aero Incubator has corporate partners. Any entity that is interested in exploring the potential of the new market, contributing to the works of the incubator in facilitating businesses and technology solutions, access to talent, network and lobbying may become partner to the McFly.aero Incubator:  - aircraft manufacturers and automakers - technology and policy consultants - engineering and design companies - software developers - academic institutions - architecture buros - construction companies - mass media - business incubators and accelerators - investment funds  Blockchain.aero Technology Consortium is a narrower circle of Incubator’s partners, who commit to developing and manufacturing devices and technologies that will work in orchestra according to the standards being developed, and therefore may be included as parts of the common shared infrastructure or grid-connected IoT devices. At the time of writing the Consortium includes 12 companies, featuring projects like Farad Enengy, Universa, Bartini, Hepard, Iamaero, TFT Aero, AFRUS, CreativeRussia, Emercoin, Drone Empoyee by AIRA Labs. More are expected - just follow our news.

Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: At first we expect that eVTOLs will be piloted by professional pilots. It is not because such piloting is expected to be difficult - compared to helicopter, it will require almost no skills at all - but at first, to play it safe, authorities will inevitably request qualified pilots to be there. Then, we have all the reasons to expect that there will be some easy training, 3-6 practice hours at most, to obtain authorisation for piloting an eVTOL. And in some years, eVTOLs will become fully auto-piloted, and therefore no certification will be required at all.

Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hello McFlyers! Some of them already noticed — our Airdrop is live! It’s a Teledrop: airdrop on Telegram. McFly Telegram bot tracks your actions and referrals you invite.  9 000 000 tokens (equals to 2340 ETH at the final July rate) will be distributed via bot. Each member will get 100 McFLY tokens after filling the info (join @tomcfly Telegram chat, add your name, ETH address, e-mail). Tokens will be sent in August. +50 for the e-mail verification (click the activation link sent to your e-mail). +10 for the each of invited referrals filled the info (not just clicking the link).  Register for the Airdrop here: @McFlyAeroBot  When all 9M McFLY tokens will be distributed, McFlyAeroBot will tell you: “Teledrop has been finished, but you still can submit your details or check your balance."  If somehow not all of 9M tokens are distributed, then we will airdrop the rest via Ethereum network.  More people you invite, more tokens you will get!

Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hello, it's not as fast as we expected, but here we are. Yeah, this account may treated as a representative of the project. As to our current progress, I'm only to share the information which already published. Our technical focus is to construct a prototype, we shared some photos in our Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/mcfly.aero/posts/1584972301617922) and will do some more this week, for sure. We've got new bounty program at bounty0x platform. Moreover, there were recent arcticles about us in notable media resources: e.g https://www.businessdailyafrica.com/corporate/tech/Sh800-a-minute-flying-cars-group-eyes-Nairobi/4258474-4332532-2w85sqz/index.html ; https://thenextweb.com/syndication/2018/03/16/mcfly-project-wants-launch-flying-taxis-blockchain-nairobi/ . Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: We have received numerous requests to give our supporters more time after TLP 1.1. closed before TLP 1.2 would start. And we can understand why — the cause has grown beyond us.  During TLP 1.1 we have been heard by entrepreneurs in many cities, by media, by educational partners, by industry and regulatory experts.  They inform us that more time to cement the larger scale of public relations and network activities will add more value and strength to the community.  And we hear you!  Only a brief discussion among the participants of the Blockchain.aero Consortium was enough to fully support the idea that with every day we grow stronger and will then empower the Community with even more good news coming from our labs before the TLP 1.2.  In the meanwhile, you can send ETH to our address and get McFly tokens before the TLP 1.2 starts.  15% early-bird bonuses for ≥ 5 ETH.  https://mcfly.aero/contribute/

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: At first we expect that eVTOLs will be piloted by professional pilots. It is not because such piloting is expected to be difficult - compared to helicopter, it will require no skills at all - but at first, to play it safe, authorities will inevitably request qualified pilots to be there. Then, we have all the reasons to expect that there will be some easy training, 3-6 practice hours at most, to obtain authorisation for piloting an eVTOL. And in some years, eVTOLs will become fully auto-piloted, and therefore no certification will be required at all.

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: One of the fundamental risks of any project engaged in aircraft manufacturing in this new industry is... Let’s put it like this. There are 15 private and not very large aircraft designer companies. When they release their VTOLs to public, they will at once find themselves among giants like Uber, Boeing, Embraer, Airbus, Bell Helicopter, etc. - all these are large companies with their other side-businesses, with which they can subsidize their research in the same field, pushing us away from the market. So everybody of us, everybody of these 15 companies, require venture investments. Venture investors always say - you know, our risk in your business is that the margin in this market will not be yours to enjoy. Passengers will be paying trillion dollars for the flight, but you’ll get nothing from it, because giants will simply push you away.  Respectfully, the first emergency for us is to arrange for our direct interaction with the market of customer flights by means of the shared economy with a ridesharing decentralised network  instead of the centralised management. This is how we want to see the future. To make this future real, our main task should not be just to make a VTOL, but to make it generally available for you and me and everybody to fly. And here comes blockchain implementation, which becomes inseparable from the task of producing VTOLs.

Body: In my opinion, it’s a kind of a crowdfunding, if you wanna to support the project, you do it on your own’s risk P.S. I think they don’t make a new system, they use etherium to sell tokens

Author: Victor McFly-Collins
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Tesla could just buy some tokens to make their Mars colonization easier, oh wait, they don’t need them, because Mcfly will launch a flying car faster than Elon Musk will make a successful colony on Mars

Author: artemiy
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Was trying to find something more about the project on the web and found some info about their partner, bartini, it is a russian start-up, that promises to launch a car in 2018, here you can read it, if you are interested in  https://www.rbth.com/science_and_tech/2017/07/20/back-to-the-future-flying-taxis-to-transport-muscovites-in-2018_807455

Author: Notin2
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: I saw this and i immediately think this is not real, by the way which country will this be effective?

Author: tanil
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hello! Can you give some additional information about your company? Is it one startup or something like network of startups around the world?

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hi! It's like the latter - we are a Consortium including several independent companies and startups engaged in innovations and business related to aero taxi and small in-city aviation

Author: andycee
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hi, I've got two questions. When the first prototype will appear? Can you tell, when the first flight will happen?

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hey! The half-size model by Bartini will be presented in Q1 of 2018 and full-size will be shown in Q4 of 2018. We expect the first test flight will happen in the first half of 2018 , and the first commercial flights for tokens by 2020

Author: tanil
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: So can I buy a flying car for personal use for the McFly tokens?

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Buying the flying car is no needed - you can get  the opportunity to use it for various periods. for example, you can get 3 years of usage of 2-seater Bartini for 500 000 Mcfly tokens and 700 000 for 4-seater.

Author: andycee
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Ok, I got this, but I have never heard about legislation in this sphere, for example, I'm from Stockholm and the airspace over the city is restricted for private flights area, what will you do with this?

Author: ArtyomTref
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Some cities have already permitted intra-city small aviation flights - like Dubai did earlier this year. Some cities are in the process of development of flight rules. We realise this requires time, but as soon as any city starts to use aero taxi, others will strive to catch up. We really hope that Stocholm will either follow the trend, or even become a leader, with sufficient supporters

Author: tanil
Title: [ANN] MCFLY.AERO: Decentralized Flying Cars Infrastructure. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Why are you sure in this question?
